```{r pressure, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
pitchers <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/pitchers_simple.csv")
d <- pitchers %>% subset(ID == "hwang000in") %>% select(-Name, -Name.mykbo, -KName, -Position, -ID)
d <- d[order(-d$Season),]
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,0,1,1,1,3,2,2,2), col.names = c("Season","Team","Age","G","GS","IP","K/9","BB/9","HR/9","BABIP","ERA","FIP","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T)
```
### Career Progression
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
if(nrow(d) > 1){ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = d$Age,y = d$FIP), size = 2, color = "#0f1b34") + theme_minimal() + labs(x = "Age", y = "FIP")}
